publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-541 Tommy Sheridan: NatWest Takeover-That the Parliament notes with concern that the takeover by the Royal Bank of Scotland of the National Westminster Bank will lead to 18,000 job losses in Scotland and England and calls upon the Scottish Executive to make urgent representations to the Competition Commission and Her Majesty's Government to examine whether this take-over is of benefit to consumers and employers as well as shareholders.

S1M-541 Tommy Sheridan: NatWest Takeover—That the Parliament notes with concern that the takeover by the Royal Bank of Scotland of the National Westminster Bank will lead to 18,000 job losses in Scotland and England and calls upon the Scottish Executive to make urgent representations to the Competition Commission and Her Majesty’s Government to examine whether this take-over is of benefit to consumers and employers as well as shareholders.
